categories: Category:Battles of the Third Alsakan Conflict

nodes.text: Battle of Raxus Prime  (Third Alsakan Conflict)
During the Third Alsakan Conflict, in 14,300 BBY, a battle was fought on the planet Raxus Prime between the Machinists of Nikato and the Duros Red Credit Brigade.

The Machinists of Nikato defeated the Duros Red Credit Brigade during the battle. Following their victory, the Machinists of Nikato established a pocket realm known as the Nikato's Bootheel. Raxus Prime became the central world of the realm and enjoyed a renaissance thereafter.
